landing.heroTitle: The New Way to Learn Languages
landing.heroSubtitle: Learn and share words faster with Vocapedia!
landing.feature1Description: We offer a platform where everyone can create and share their own word lists.
landing.feature2Description: You can learn words from the lists you create in a fun way through games.
landing.feature3Description: You can easily download and save your created word lists in PDF format.
landing.securityDescription: Our application prioritizes user security by using OTP, reducing the risk of account takeover to almost zero.
landing.chromeExtensionDescription: With the Vocapedia Chrome extension, you are occasionally reminded of the words in the list, so you don't forget them.
landing.whyLearnDescription: Learning languages helps you see the world from a broader perspective. Vocapedia speeds up and streamlines your language learning process.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.introduction: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, protect, and share the personal data we collect when you use our application. Please review this policy carefully.

dataCollection.title: Data We Collect
dataCollection.text: We collect the following personal data in our application: Name and Email: We use the OTP (One-Time Password) system for users to log in. Therefore, we collect your email address. Device Information: User device information is collected for analysis and to provide secure access. This information is also used when creating JWT tokens.

dataUsage.title: Data Usage
dataUsage.text: We use the data we collect for the following purposes: User Login and Security: We use your email address to perform verification with OTP and provide secure login. Data Analysis: We use device information to perform analysis to improve the user experience. JWT Token Management: We create JWT tokens for user authentication.

thirdPartySharing.title: Third-Party Sharing
thirdPartySharing.text: We use Google Analytics, but we do not share user data directly with third parties. Google Analytics is only anonymous data used to analyze application usage.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.text: We take measures to store data securely: API Security: Our APIs are protected by security measures such as rate limiting. Data Storage: Data is stored directly in the database, but there is no additional encryption in the database.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.text: We grant users the following rights: Data Access: Users have the right to access the personal data we collect. Data Correction: Users can update their personal data. Data Deletion: Users have the right to delete their accounts and remove their personal data.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.text: We do not use cookies in our application. Data is only stored in localStorage.

dataStorage.title: Data Storage Duration
dataStorage.text: The collected data is stored indefinitely in localStorage.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.text: Our application does not collect special data from children. We do not knowingly collect data from users under the age of 13.
